subject: WORLDCOMP10 Paper Submission
body:
WORLDCOMP'12 Confirmation of paper submission 

Your First Name: Foaad 
Your Last Name:  Khosmood 
Your Email Address: foaad@calpoly.edu 
Conference: ICAI'12 
Title of paper:  Comparison of Sentence-level Paraphrasing Approaches for Statistical Style Transformation  
Author(s): Foaad Khosmood 

Affliation(s): California Polytechnic State University 

Author Emails: foaad@calpoly.edu 

Your File: icai-12.pdf 

Your PaperID:  ICA3942 
 
 
The WORLDCOMP'12 Committee will be emailing you the status of your paper 
by around APRIL 26, 2012 (+ possibly 7 days). You can upload a new version of your paper or modify 
your paper by logging on to the web site at: 
http://world-comp.org/ 

Username: foaad@calpoly.edu 
Password: xflr 

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

The WORLDCOMP 2012 web site is: http://www.world-academy-of-science.org/
